name: Garry's Game (GB studio game)
description: Garry's Game is pretty much just a sub-par de-make of hit sandbox game: Gmod! In Garry's Game, you are put in the shoes of, well, you!  Begin your adventure through this sandbox-ish game, where you can spawn and interact with NPCs! (This is a side project using assets of my half-life de-make, so it's not that great due to time constraints.)
